description: Schema for submitting an experimental replicate.
title: Replicate

___biological_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using a different biological source, measuring the variability in the biological source.
___biological_replicate_number.title: Biological replicate

___library.description: The nucleic acid library used in this replicate.
___library.title: Library

___rbns_protein_concentration_units.comment: The unit for the dependant rbns_protein_concentration.
___rbns_protein_concentration_units.title: RBNS protein concentration units

___rbns_protein_concentration.description: For use only with RNA Bind-n-Seq replicates to indicate the protein concentration.
___rbns_protein_concentration.comment: Only for use with RBNS replicates.
___rbns_protein_concentration.title: RBNS protein concentration

___antibody.description: For Immunoprecipitation assays, the antibody used.
___antibody.title: Antibody

___technical_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using the same biological source, measuring the variability in the method.
___technical_replicate_number.title: Technical replicate

___experiment.description: The experiment the replicate belongs to.
___experiment.title: Experiment
